statements: SELECT * FROM furniture_inventory;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM furniture_inventory;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price, item_quantity FROM furniture_inventory;
SELECT * FROM furniture_inventory WHERE item_category = 'Chair';
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM furniture_inventory ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM furniture_inventory WHERE item_price > 100
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price, item_quantity FROM furniture_inventory WHERE item_quantity < 50 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT * FROM furniture_inventory WHERE item_category = 'Chairs' ORDER BY item_price ASC, item_quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM furniture_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%able%' AND item_quantity > 0
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM furniture_inventory WHERE item_category = 'Tables' OR item_category = 'Desks' ORDER BY item_price DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, name, category FROM products ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, total_price, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND price < 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC, price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM furniture;
SELECT id, item_name, price FROM furniture WHERE category = 'Chairs';
SELECT item_name, price FROM furniture WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, category, price, quantity FROM furniture WHERE category = 'Tables' OR category = 'Sofas';
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM furniture WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY category ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM furniture ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM furniture WHERE category = 'Chair' AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY price;
SELECT item_name, category, description FROM furniture WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY category, price DESC;

SELECT f.item_name, f.price, c.first_name, o.order_date FROM furniture f JOIN orders o ON f.id = o.item_id JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, count(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.first_name, c.last_name HAVING total_orders >= 3 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM high_end_furniture;
SELECT id, name, price FROM high_end_furniture ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, service_type, description FROM staging_services WHERE service_type = 'Decor';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM staging_orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM furniture_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, name, price, quantity FROM high_end_furniture ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM staging_services WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, total_price FROM staging_orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT id, description, service_type FROM staging_services WHERE service_type LIKE '%design%';
SELECT * FROM furniture_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, price FROM furniture;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number, email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT item_type, material, quantity FROM furniture WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT oi.order_id, oi.item_id, f.item_name, oi.quantity, oi.total_price FROM order_items oi JOIN furniture f ON oi.item_id = f.item_id ORDER BY oi.total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM furniture WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM furniture WHERE material = 'Wood' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, price FROM furniture WHERE quantity < 10 AND material = 'Glass';
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE contact_person LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM inventory INNER JOIN vendors ON inventory.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name ORDER BY total_items DESC;
